summary: Ironstrange being called as a hate ship towards Steve...I don’t know
body:
Ironstrange being called as a hate ship towards Steve…I don’t know

(If you don’t like the long explanation, go to the very end and see what I’m trying to say even if it contradicts some parts of my arguement. I tried to state my point. But go to the end and see what i mean overall.)

OK, so I hear that there people calling Ironstrange as a “hate” ship. Now I see this as a very stupid way to call out a ship. I mean yes, there are people who dislike Steve because of what had happened to Tony. And believe me, I feel the same. I disliked how it seemed that Steve cared more about Bucky than the others, especially about Bucky killing Tony’s parents. Even though, he considers Howard his friend, so wouldn’t it be logical to tell your friend’s son about his death. However, I do not “hate” Steve in a way other fan would see, I just hate the way he handled the situation. But that doesn’t mean I hate him as a whole, just how he handle his actions, and what could have been done to avoid the Civil war in the first place. I’ll talk about that another time, back to the topic.

So, antis calling ironstrange a “hate” ship. Ok, if you apply that logic about “shippers hating on Steve”, wouldn’t the rest of the ships that include Tony being with someone else besides Steve, a “hate” ship. Because, believe me, there are many more people who put the tag ,”Not Steve friendly” or “Not Team Cap friendly” on other ships, way before Ironstrange became popular. There were many who wrote Tchalla x Tony, iron boyfriends, Quill x Tony, Science boyfriends, Frostiron, and Pepperony fics that were “Not Steve friendly” because they were bitter on Steve’s actions. Especially, the Winteriron ship who wanted both Bucky and Tony to heal together and put the tag “Not Steve friendly” due to bitterness of what had happened due to Civil war and before that. Some don’t even put shipping into their “Not Steve friendly” Fics and they were just as bitter as the shippers were at that time, during Civil War. Also, there are others who do crossover ship, like Batman x Tony, who also wrote “Not Steve friendly” fics.

So, if you antis are calling Ironstrange a hate ship because of what happened with Steve, then you’ll be calling out on all the ships that doesn’t even ship ironstrange out because of had happened in civil war. Hey Antis, if that is what is going on then congratulations, you are an official Ship hater. Antis who are mad at shippers thinking at specific ship are made to hate on Steve, now hate Pepperony, Science boyfriends, Iron boyfriends, Winteriron, Frostiron, Thor x Tony, Tchalla x Tony, Quill x Tony, and many other pairings that have people being shipped with Tony.If you can hint at the level of bitter sarcasm at what I just called the antis, thank you for noticing. And to be honest, people shipping Tony with anyone else but Steve aren’t the only one who dont appreciate Steve’s actions towards Civil War. In fact some people who ship Steve with anyone thinks that due to Steve’s actions of mainly focusing on Bucky and his past think that Steve is getting a little unhealthy on how he handles things, that’s why some don’t appreciate the ship Stucky. Anyways, now let’s talk about the general ship that is being called a hate ship.

Seriously, I know that they didnt have that much interaction within Infinity war, but haven’t you read the comics. They have interacted on many occasions during the comics, helping each other out. Where do you think they got the name, “Facial hair bros” or “Facial hair husbands” for some. They got those names in the comics based on their interactions. and they seem to work very well with each other, even though due to their personality it could irritate each other some times. So, what makes it a hate ship? Is it because that you think Steve should be paired with Tony? Due you hate Tony? Do you hate Stephen? Well, if we are basing this on the MCU verse Stony, after Civil War and before, the two seem to have some shifty unbalance with each other due to different perspectives of how things should go. Especially, since the Accords. For some who dislike to ship Tony with Steve or do not appear to like Steve any more, they see Steve as someone fighting for an alternative motive, not just fighting against Tony because of the Accords. It’s what the government may to do to Bucky. His old friend who he sees as person from his past that he can still hold on to. Come on, Sharon literally told Steve what may happen to Bucky if he was caught by Tchalla and Tony, which he opposed. And some see that as very unhealthy behavior if they were to pair Tony with Steve because they’d think Steve is only going to use him again. Even some shippers think that way of Stucky because they think that Steve is making Bucky’s decisions, as stated on the previous paragraph.

Now yes, me talking and explaining everything about this ship hate has already made this rant a little bit confusing but, what I’m basically saying is. Ironstramge is not a hate ship, you antis. It’s a different ship, that these fans consider healthy due to similar personalities with the characters and similar past that helped redeem themselves from who they once were. And they think that if they were shipped together, it’s compatible. There are people out there who dislike Steve due to Civil war, and they aren’t just Ironstrange shippers. So don’t start calling out on Ironstrange shipper, just because you think that they just want to release the anger that have on Steve. Because, there are others out there who do ship ironstrange, Understand that the hate on Steve has to stop. They have post out there that have Stucky and Ironstrange together as a family helping raise Peter. Some post are out there having all four of them into an OT4. And others just want Steve to be a supportive to Ironstrange, whether or not Steve has Bucky.

Anyways, at the end of the day. Most people just want the hate on Steve, Tony, or Any characters and ships to end. No one wants to see wars and hate, we just came to this community to have fun and enjoy fan art, fan fiction, and other contributions to the fandom that we all enjoy. So stop the hate already! Anyways, see ya for the next thing I may post.

So, if you antis are calling Ironstrange a hate ship because of what happened with Steve, then you’ll be calling out on all the ships that doesn’t even ship ironstrange out because of had happened in civil war. Hey Antis, if that is what is going on then congratulations, you are an official Ship hater. Antis who are mad at shippers thinking at specific ship are made to hate on Steve, now hate Pepperony, Science boyfriends, Iron boyfriends, Winteriron, Frostiron, Thor x Tony, Tchalla x Tony, Quill x Tony, and many other pairings that have people being shipped with Tony.If you can hint at the level of bitter sarcasm at what I just called the antis, thank you for noticing. And to be honest, people shipping Tony with anyone else but Steve aren’t the only one who dont appreciate Steve’s actions towards Civil War. In fact some people who ship Steve with anyone thinks that due to Steve’s actions of mainly focusing on Bucky and his past think that Steve is getting a little unhealthy on how he handles things, that’s why some don’t appreciate the ship Stucky. Anyways, now let’s talk about the general ship that is being called a hate ship.

Seriously, I know that they didnt have that much interaction within Infinity war, but haven’t you read the comics. They have interacted on many occasions during the comics, helping each other out. Where do you think they got the name, “Facial hair bros” or “Facial hair husbands” for some. They got those names in the comics based on their interactions. and they seem to work very well with each other, even though due to their personality it could irritate each other some times. So, what makes it a hate ship? Is it because that you think Steve should be paired with Tony? Due you hate Tony? Do you hate Stephen? Well, if we are basing this on the MCU verse Stony, after Civil War and before, the two seem to have some shifty unbalance with each other due to different perspectives of how things should go. It’s what the government may to do to Bucky. His old friend who he sees as person from his past that he can still hold on to. Come on, Sharon literally told Steve what may happen to Bucky if he was caught by Tchalla and Tony, which he opposed. And some see that as very unhealthy behavior if they were to pair Tony with Steve because they’d think Steve is only going to use him again. Even some shippers think that way of Stucky because they think that Steve is making Bucky’s decisions, as stated on the previous paragraph.

Now yes, me talking and explaining everything about this ship hate has already made this rant a little bit confusing but, what I’m basically saying is. Ironstramge is not a hate ship, you antis. It’s a different ship, that these fans consider healthy due to similar personalities with the characters and similar past that helped redeem themselves from who they once were. And they think that if they were shipped together, it’s compatible. There are people out there who dislike Steve due to Civil war, and they aren’t just Ironstrange shippers. So don’t start calling out on Ironstrange shipper, just because you think that they just want to release the anger that have on Steve. Because, there are others out there who do ship ironstrange, Understand that the hate on Steve has to stop. They have post out there that have Stucky and Ironstrange together as a family helping raise Peter. Some post are out there having all four of them into an OT4. And others just want Steve to be a supportive to Ironstrange, whether or not Steve has Bucky.

Anyways, at the end of the day. Most people just want the hate on Steve, Tony, or Any characters and ships to end. No one wants to see wars and hate, we just came to this community to have fun and enjoy fan art, fan fiction, and other contributions to the fandom that we all enjoy. So stop the hate already! Anyways, see ya for the next thing I may post.

blog.title: Tom Holland
blog.description:
➳ I stan a meme named Tom Holland
➳ REQEUSTS ARE OPEN
➳ Infinity War took my worst nightmare and charged me $12 to see it
➳ masterlist
➳ requests

title: Just Hold Me || Tom Holland (Teaser)
body:
Tom Holland x Reader

Summary: Tom holds a chance for him to go to homecoming with someone as a fundraiser for his Brother’s Trust Organization. Your younger sister just happens to be the lucky winner, but there’s a downside. Her cancer came back and it was stronger than ever, she was stuck in the hospital but she wanted you to go to homecoming for her. Your story is filled with a whirlwind of emotions, ups, and downs, fights and apologies, but most importantly. Family.

(Teaser)

The room was filled with cries as your little sister got the email that she had one the contest Tom Holland was holding for his Brother’s Trust Foundation. You were stuck listening to her cries as she stared at your phone, “Hadley, I’m so sorry.” Your sister has stage 4 leukemia, she was fine for the past 2 years but it came back. Stronger than ever, “I don’t even get to go to my last homecoming before I die.” Your eyebrows furrowed as you leaned closer to her, “don’t talk like that. You are not going to die.” Their parent died when you were 18, that was 2 years ago. You became the official guardian of your sister who was going into her senior year of high school.

Hadley turned towards her, “can you go for me?” You sat there, your mouth ajar for a moment. “I have to take care of you, I can’t go to-” Hadley pouted her lip, “please.” You sighed giving her a soft smile, “fine.” Hadley smiled, she did a small cheer before typing on her phone quickly. “He’s flying over tonight, and homecoming is in 3 days so you better get shopping.” You shook your head letting out a small laugh, “the things I do for you.” Hadley smiled grabbing your hand, “because you love me.” You smiled back at her, holding her hand tightly. “Because I love you.”

Want to be on the tag list, request here.

title: Are you acting Jealous?
body:
Marvel 

Tony Stark x female! reader

Warning: mentions of nightmares and panic attacks 

Specifics: fluff, romance, jealousy, theater, acting, musicals, hamilton, angst, race neutral reader

People: Tony Stark, you, Rhodey (mentioned), actor guy (oc) 

Words: 1,036

Requested: By anonymously Not sure if this counts as an Infinity War request but here I go: could you do a story in which the reader is a theater actress and has a passionate kissing scene on stage, and Stark is all jealous? The reader and Stark are already a couple he’s just being a jealous little bby


Authors Note: holy poops i luved this request to pieces, so a few things is i made the reader eliza from hamilton (cuz i live for that musical it legit is my life) i hope tony wasnt ooc cuz god knows how hard i tried to make it sound and act like him lol. but this is my first tony fic he is one of my husbands cuz if any of u know i am a NASTY HOE for marvel bois(・ω<) but jelly tony is just too cute like my bby just wants luv and attention tysm for ur request. pls feedback is much appreciated, enjoy!

The theater. It was like your second home. You felt you could be yourself and embrace the true you there. It all started when you were young. You always took such a strong interest in the theater, everything about it amazed you. The acting, the props, costumes, even the people back stage mattered so much to you. It was like you found your calling. 

You got into the arts and have been in it ever since. During one of your shows you met the famous, popular, dashing Tony Stark. Or how others called him Iron Man. You truly did enjoy his company and his compliments of your acting. It meant a lot to you. After meeting him that one night, you and him started to go more on dates. He would always ask about the theater, heck he even remembered some of your friends from there. Tony knew how much you cherished the work of theater, and he encouraged you on that. 

But there was one matter he didn’t really encourage you on. 

“Babe its just gonna be one kiss,” you have been going back and forth with Tony on the smooch you would be doing on the stage. 

“Thats what they always say and then it becomes something way, way more than that,” Tony said outstretching his arm in front of him pointing to you. 

You chuckled at Tony’s attitude. “Is smarty pants, rich Mr. Stark jealous?”

Tony turned to you abruptly, giving you a face of his mouth hanging wide open, “Are you serious y/n? No I’m not jealous, I don’t know where you got that idea. Look sweetheart, I’ve never been jealous, you know who has? Rhodey, when I drank the last of the whiskey, he was jealous. I Tony Stark have never been jealous.”

You bit your lip and nodded, “Right, you know thats what people say when they are jealous.”

Tony heaved a big sigh and walked like a lost puppy to you. He wrapped his arms around your torso and gave you a kiss on your forehead. “…fine I may be a tiny bit jealous.”

You smiled, feeling, unknown to you, happy that he felt that way. 

“I just don’t want no one taking my baby away from me,” Tony admitted. 

You hugged Tony back and kissed his lips lightly, “No one would ever be able to do that. I love you too much, you are my one and only.” You kiss him again but this time longer and more passionately. 

The musical you were in was Hamilton. You grew in love with the cast and the music, literally everything. You were playing Eliza who was Alexander Hamilton’s wife. 

Tony, who sang each and every song with you when you both were home, sang the songs whilst sitting in his seat watching you. You already sang “Helpless”, and the kiss that Tony was so worried about was when Eliza and Alexander are at their wedding and they share a kiss. 

The kiss was to symbolize the love they have for each other. 

The wedding scene was about to start and you knew you had to make this kiss seem real. 

You went to the guy playing Hamilton and with your veil and bouquet of flowers with you, you slowly, lovingly, kissed the actor. 

You made sure the kiss was passionate but not too much. After the kiss happened everyone clapped at your performance. You looked all around at the audience until you spotted a familiar face. Tony’s. But he didn’t seem happy or glad. He was clapping but his face looked depressed. Worried, you knitted your eyebrows together. Was he really that hurt by the kiss?

The musical was over and everyone loved it. They were amazed by all the actors, including your performance. 

You sprinted outside in search for Tony. Who was waiting patiently for you in the car. 

“So babe,” you said while getting in. “What’d you think?”

“Oh yeah you did great,” he gave you a thumbs up, “it was perfect.” He turned away from you looking out the window. 

“Tony?” You lightly touched his shoulder. He seemed cold, and distant towards you. 

You both arrived to his house. As you got inside you were panicking about Tony’s behavior. 

“Ok, Tony, whats wrong?” Your voice boomed with demand all of a sudden, breaking the ice between you two. 

“Nothings wrong,” Tony said, trying to shrug it off. 

You made him face you, “yes there is. Tony its like your shutting me out, you’re distant. Why? If its because that kiss I’m sorry, I didn’t think it would affect you that much. I promise I won’t do any more of those.”

“Its not just about the kiss.”

You shook your head, “I’m not following.”

“When I saw you kissing that guy, and the wedding music, it was all, it seemed real. I felt, like maybe you wouldn’t want that with me cause of who I am. I feel like I might not ever give that to you. I’m that guy who fought all those scary aliens, that guy that gets panic attacks and nightmares because of that day. I’m damaged y/n, and sometimes I think I might not be able to give you that amazing life. So to answer your question earlier, yes, I am madly jealous of that guy. That he got to kiss somebody so incredible, somebody that deserves everything.”

You knew Tony was overwhelmed and you would never wish that on him. You brought him into a hug, comforting him with your soothing voice. “Baby, I don’t want anyone else. I don’t care if you’re damaged, I want to help you with that. I want to be the one to take care of you when you do have your panic attacks, your nightmares, those moments. I want to be with you through the good, bad, through everything. I love you Tony more than anything in the world,” you lace your fingers with his and kiss his hands. 

Tony places his forehead against yours and kisses you passionately. “I love you so much baby.”

You grin, and whisper in his ear, “so I was right, you were jealous.”

“Oh my god y/n! Give it up already!”

Requested: By anonymously Not sure if this counts as an Infinity War request but here I go: could you do a story in which the reader is a theater actress and has a passionate kissing scene on stage, and Stark is all jealous? The reader and Stark are already a couple he’s just being a jealous little bby


Authors Note: holy poops i luved this request to pieces, so a few things is i made the reader eliza from hamilton (cuz i live for that musical it legit is my life) i hope tony wasnt ooc cuz god knows how hard i tried to make it sound and act like him lol. but this is my first tony fic he is one of my husbands cuz if any of u know i am a NASTY HOE for marvel bois(・ω<) but jelly tony is just too cute like my bby just wants luv and attention tysm for ur request. pls feedback is much appreciated, enjoy!

The theater. It was like your second home. You felt you could be yourself and embrace the true you there. It all started when you were young. You always took such a strong interest in the theater, everything about it amazed you. The acting, the props, costumes, even the people back stage mattered so much to you. It was like you found your calling. 

You got into the arts and have been in it ever since. During one of your shows you met the famous, popular, dashing Tony Stark. Or how others called him Iron Man. You truly did enjoy his company and his compliments of your acting. It meant a lot to you. After meeting him that one night, you and him started to go more on dates. He would always ask about the theater, heck he even remembered some of your friends from there. Tony knew how much you cherished the work of theater, and he encouraged you on that.

summary: I saw that gifset you reblogged where Peter mentions "that really old movie" Alien and I was wondering do you think Peter just...
question: I saw that gifset you reblogged where Peter mentions "that really old movie" Alien and I was wondering do you think Peter just makes Tony feel old all the time? Like how there are things you remember but then you meet someone who wasn't born yet when they happened? and he has to ask Peter to stop calling things "really old" if. they came out in Tony's lifetime. And then one day Peter says "You know that really old movie The Wizard of Oz?" and hears Steve yelling "HEY!" from the next room
answer:
I think Peter isn’t intentionally making Tony feel old. The kid’s 15/16 and I’ve heard my 16-year-old cousin refer to stuff like that without a thought. So yeah, I think it’s just natural for Peter to say that, but then when Tony mentions it then he may realize what he’s saying.

And I’ve been referring to the Wizard of Oz as a really old movie since before I can remember, so I’m totally there with Peter. XD Poor Steve.

title: Not A Toy - Prologue
body:
Pairing: Natasha Romanoff x fem!reader

Summary: After missions Natasha needs a little stress relief. You might enjoy that a little too much.

Requested by anonymous. Find the request here.

Warnings: mentions of anxiety, insomnia, injuries and sex

Words: 1,119

You tossed around in your bed, trying to find some sleep. Your dad and the team were expected to come back to the Avengers base soon. Having not seen them in two weeks you were excited for them to return, hoping all of them would be fine. You had only recently moved to the base but already you held each one of them close to your heart.

Tony had always put a lot of effort into keeping you safe and out of harm’s reach. The public eye had never been on you, he had made sure of it. Given the opportunity to live a normal live apart from all of the troubles being rich and famous brought along you went to school like everyone else and then to college, taking after your father.

You were a little slower at it, though. Not because you didn’t have the abilities to rise above everyone else when it came to grades but because you wanted to hide just that. Being a genius among kids is not the best thing to be after all. Whenever a teacher would praise you in front of the class you just wanted to hide from all the eyes that were on you, like you always did. You didn’t want the attention of a bunch of mean and jealous children. You were almost glad once you finished school and went to college.

But now that you had finished that too, you needed work experience. And what place could possibly be better than the lab of your father and a genius with anger managing issues? You had been struggling to adjust at first with all the new people and the big compound but thankfully everyone was keen to help. You loved the team dearly, all of them being a part of your life now, someone protecting you from the evil in the world additionally to your father.

They were a protective shield around you and you missed them when they were gone. It didn’t bother you that they would go on missions and leave you alone. You could deal with that. You always had dealt with spending little time with your father anyways (which didn’t keep you from loving each other), you didn’t want them to come back so that they could protect you. It was quite the opposite. You wanted them to return so that you could keep them safe and protected. They deserved more: more love and happiness, more quiet nights and healing. You wanted to give that to them, every time they would return from a mission, every time you expected them not to return and were proven otherwise.

So now, there you were, in your bed, desperately waiting for that moment of relief and happiness pushing away every ounce of exhaustion and anxiety that bundled up in you through these past two weeks. Just as Tony had always been concerned for your safety you were just as concerned for his. His missions made you sleep less and worse, they made you linger around the compound not letting you rest. They made your palms sweaty and unsteady every time you thought about the times he would return bloodied and bruised, your walk a little slower and your mind a little faster. Sometimes it would send horrible thoughts racing through you, anxiety rippling along with them. They made you stay awake until 2 AM, waiting for Friday to announce his arrival. You waited for that now.

And just as you reflected on the past two week you had spent alone in the base trying to figure out a way to spend the remaining time until the team arrived when - just like it had been reading your mind - the AI finally spoke to you: “The team has just arrived. Everyone is back and seems to suffer only minor injuries.”

The sheets were sent flying to the floor, your feet knowing their way around the compound well enough to find the hangar by themselves now.

Everyone had been tired, including you, eager to go (back) to bed and relax after the past fourteen days, be it because of injuries or exhaustion, everyone in the compound needed and deserved a good night’s sleep and everyone was on their way to get some except for Natasha.

She was tired, sure; exhausted, of course – how could she not be, she just spent two weeks with Sam and Bucky – but she couldn’t unwind. Unlike everyone else she didn’t relax throughout the flight back home, the tension that had made its way into her muscles never leaving or easing off even the tiniest bit. She needed stress relief and the first thing that came to mind when thinking about that was, well, sex. Unfortunately, there wasn’t really anyone around she could have sex with right now and she certainly was not in the mood to go out and look for someone.

Her feet hurt and a small but evil slash on her calf was keeping her from going anywhere outside of the compound anyway. She could ask Steve to spend some time with her, she always found peace in his presence, but he had been tired out the most during the mission, he deserved some sleep. As did every other team member. So, there was only you left, which didn’t bother her at all.

The two of you had spent a great amount of time together, even before you moved into the compound. She was one of Tony’s best friends, after all. But ever since she had got to know you she had tried to keep you as far away from the danger that came along with being an Avenger. You weren’t one and you certainly were never going to be one, but Natasha’s enemies wouldn’t give a damn about that. Everything related to missions was filtered in her head before she spoke it, not wanting to burden you with triggering information.

Wincing slightly as she walked towards your room after a short but well deserved hot shower she hoped you were still up. She knew that you would never neglect her care and comfort when she would ask for it, she only had be given the chance to do so. Lucky for her, you were awake.

“Hey,” you mumbled into the dark hallway, tired eyes almost falling shut as you spoke. “Wha’s wrong?” you managed to get out.

Smiling softly at your sleepy form holding onto the open door of your room she replied: “All good, I could just use some stress relief. I thought maybe-“

“Am I supposed to massage you now?” you yawned out, slowly becoming more awake.

“Well,” Natasha laughed a little. “Wouldn’t be the worst idea.”

Find the first chapter here.

But now that you had finished that too, you needed work experience. And what place could possibly be better than the lab of your father and a genius with anger managing issues? You had been struggling to adjust at first with all the new people and the big compound but thankfully everyone was keen to help. You loved the team dearly, all of them being a part of your life now, someone protecting you from the evil in the world additionally to your father.

They were a protective shield around you and you missed them when they were gone. It didn’t bother you that they would go on missions and leave you alone. You could deal with that. You always had dealt with spending little time with your father anyways (which didn’t keep you from loving each other), you didn’t want them to come back so that they could protect you. It was quite the opposite. You wanted them to return so that you could keep them safe and protected. They deserved more: more love and happiness, more quiet nights and healing. You wanted to give that to them, every time they would return from a mission, every time you expected them not to return and were proven otherwise.

So now, there you were, in your bed, desperately waiting for that moment of relief and happiness pushing away every ounce of exhaustion and anxiety that bundled up in you through these past two weeks. Just as Tony had always been concerned for your safety you were just as concerned for his. His missions made you sleep less and worse, they made you linger around the compound not letting you rest. They made your palms sweaty and unsteady every time you thought about the times he would return bloodied and bruised, your walk a little slower and your mind a little faster. Sometimes it would send horrible thoughts racing through you, anxiety rippling along with them. They made you stay awake until 2 AM, waiting for Friday to announce his arrival. You waited for that now.

And just as you reflected on the past two week you had spent alone in the base trying to figure out a way to spend the remaining time until the team arrived when - just like it had been reading your mind - the AI finally spoke to you: “The team has just arrived. Everyone is back and seems to suffer only minor injuries.”

The sheets were sent flying to the floor, your feet knowing their way around the compound well enough to find the hangar by themselves now.

Everyone had been tired, including you, eager to go (back) to bed and relax after the past fourteen days, be it because of injuries or exhaustion, everyone in the compound needed and deserved a good night’s sleep and everyone was on their way to get some except for Natasha.

She was tired, sure; exhausted, of course – how could she not be, she just spent two weeks with Sam and Bucky – but she couldn’t unwind. Unlike everyone else she didn’t relax throughout the flight back home, the tension that had made its way into her muscles never leaving or easing off even the tiniest bit. She needed stress relief and the first thing that came to mind when thinking about that was, well, sex. Unfortunately, there wasn’t really anyone around she could have sex with right now and she certainly was not in the mood to go out and look for someone.

Her feet hurt and a small but evil slash on her calf was keeping her from going anywhere outside of the compound anyway. She could ask Steve to spend some time with her, she always found peace in his presence, but he had been tired out the most during the mission, he deserved some sleep. As did every other team member. So, there was only you left, which didn’t bother her at all.

The two of you had spent a great amount of time together, even before you moved into the compound. She was one of Tony’s best friends, after all. But ever since she had got to know you she had tried to keep you as far away from the danger that came along with being an Avenger. You weren’t one and you certainly were never going to be one, but Natasha’s enemies wouldn’t give a damn about that. Everything related to missions was filtered in her head before she spoke it, not wanting to burden you with triggering information.

Wincing slightly as she walked towards your room after a short but well deserved hot shower she hoped you were still up. She knew that you would never neglect her care and comfort when she would ask for it, she only had be given the chance to do so. Lucky for her, you were awake.

“Hey,” you mumbled into the dark hallway, tired eyes almost falling shut as you spoke. “Wha’s wrong?” you managed to get out.

Smiling softly at your sleepy form holding onto the open door of your room she replied: “All good, I could just use some stress relief. I thought maybe-“

“Am I supposed to massage you now?” you yawned out, slowly becoming more awake.

“Well,” Natasha laughed a little. “Wouldn’t be the worst idea.”
